hero.werewolf: Experience an immersive game of Werewolves
hero.description:
Each day, you must succeed in a team challenge to earn a key role for the village. The wolves' goal? Sabotage the challenge without getting caught. No role for the village means more chances to devour everyone!

Villagers, bring out your best detective skills and try to unmask the wolves: is someone not really participating in the challenge, or subtly trying to sabotage it? You've found your target.

email.title: Email Support

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how Wolves & Whispers ("we", "our", or "us") collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our mobile application.
privacy.contactDescription: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

userProvided.title: User-Provided Information:
items: Email address (for authentication)
Username (for game identification)
Custom role compositions
Game history and statistics

automatic.title: Automatically Collected Data:
items: Device technical details
Usage patterns and performance metrics
Real-time presence status during games
Anonymized game actions and interactions

dataUsage.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
items: User authentication and account management
Gameplay support and real-time synchronization
User personalization and game history
Performance optimization and bug fixes
Security and fraud prevention
Display advertisements (with your consent in Europe)

advertising.title: 3. Advertising and Third-Party Partners
items: We use Google AdMob to display advertisements in the application
AdMob may collect advertising identifiers and usage data
You can choose between personalized or non-personalized advertisements
In Europe (GDPR), we ask for your consent before any personalized advertising
You can modify your advertising preferences at any time in settings
View Google's privacy policy: https://policies.google.com/privacy

dataStorage.title: 4. Data Storage and Security
items: Hosted on Google Cloud/Firebase with European servers
Encrypted in transit and at rest
Granular Firestore security rules
Automatic data cleanup and retention policies

userRights.title: 5. Your Rights
items: Access your personal data
Modify your account details
Delete your account and associated data
Request data portability

uniqueFeatures.title: 6. What We DON'T Do
items: No external analytics tracking (except AdMob)
Strict data isolation between games
No selling of your personal data to third parties
No advertising without your consent in Europe

changes.title: 7. Changes to This Policy
changes.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: These Terms of Service govern the use of the Wolves & Whispers application and in-app purchases available within the application.
terms.contactDescription: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at:

purchases.title: 1. In-App Purchases
items: Purchases are made through the App Store (iOS) or Google Play Store (Android)
All prices are displayed in your local currency
Purchases are final and non-transferable
For premium roles, only the game host needs to purchase them for all players to benefit

content.title: 2. Premium Content
items: Premium roles: access to additional game roles
Premium Pack: all current and future roles, unlimited compositions, detailed history
Premium Pack Plus: also includes ad removal
Purchased content is linked to your account and restorable on all your devices

refunds.title: 3. Refunds
items: Refunds are handled by Apple (App Store) or Google (Play Store)
To request a refund, contact the respective store directly
We do not directly manage in-app purchase refunds
Refer to Apple or Google refund policies for more information

usage.title: 4. Terms of Use
items: You must be at least 13 years old to use the application
Use of the application is subject to our code of conduct
Any abusive behavior may result in account suspension
We reserve the right to modify the application content

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
items: The application is provided 'as is' without warranty
We are not responsible for service interruptions
We do not guarantee permanent availability of the application
Purchases are at your own risk

changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
changes.description: We may modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with a new update date. Continued use of the application after modification constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
